greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Alternating sum of ternary digits in n. Replace 3^k with (-1)^k in ternary expansion of n.
comment: Fixed point of the morphism 0 -> 0,1,2; 1 -> -1,0,1; 2 -> -2,-1,0; ...; n -> -n,-n+1,-n+2. - _Philippe Deléham_, Oct 22 2011.
results.author: _Marc LeBrun_, Oct 31 2001
